SELECT name FROM master..sysdatabases ORDER BY name

children.query: SELECT 'Database', name FROM master..sysdatabases ORDER BY name

get.query: select * from sys.databases o where o.name = '{1}'

children.query: select 'Table', '{1}', o.object_id, 50, o.name from {1}.sys.tables o where o.is_ms_shipped = 0 order by o.name

get.query: select t.name + case t.name when 'decimal' then '(' + rtrim(o.precision) + ', ' + rtrim(o.scale) + ')' when 'varchar' then '(' + rtrim(o.max_length) + ')' else '' end 'Type', case when o.is_identity = 1 then 'Identity, ' else '' end + case when o.is_nullable = 1 then 'Null' else 'Not Null' end 'Info', o.* from {1}.sys.columns o left join {1}.sys.types t on t.system_type_id = o.system_type_id where o.object_id = {2} order by column_id

SELECT ind.name 'Index', substring( (select ', ' + col.name + case when is_descending_key = 1 then ' (desc)' else '' end AS [text()] from {1}.sys.index_columns ic INNER JOIN {1}.sys.columns col ON ic.object_id = col.object_id and ic.column_id = col.column_id where ind.object_id = ic.object_id and ind.index_id = ic.index_id and is_included_column = 0 for xml path('')) , 2, 8000) 'Indexed', substring( (select ', ' + col.name AS [text()] from {1}.sys.index_columns ic INNER JOIN {1}.sys.columns col ON ic.object_id = col.object_id and ic.column_id = col.column_id where ind.object_id = ic.object_id and ind.index_id = ic.index_id and is_included_column = 1 for xml path('')) , 2, 8000) 'Included' from {1}.sys.indexes ind where ind.object_id = {2} and ind.name is not null and ind.is_unique_constraint = 0

declare @search varchar(50) = '%[ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ]%'
SELECT isnull(s.name, '** Total **') 'Schema', isnull(groupname.name, '** Total **') 'Grouping', sum(newlines.count) 'Count' from {1}.sys.procedures p left join {1}.sys.schemas s on p.schema_id = s.schema_id left join {1}.sys.sql_modules sm on sm.object_id = p.object_id cross apply ( select p.name COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS 'name', LEFT(p.name, charindex('_', p.name)) 'leftpart1' ) as casesensitive cross apply ( select PATINDEX(@search, casesensitive.name) 'position' ) as capital1 cross apply ( select RIGHT(p.name, len(p.name) - capital1.position) 'name' ) as rightpart cross apply ( select PATINDEX(@search, rightpart.name COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS) 'position' ) as capital2 cross apply ( select case when LEFT(p.name, 4) = 'proc' and CHARINDEX('_', p.name) > 5 then casesensitive.leftpart1 when capital1.position + capital2.position = 0 then p.name else LEFT(p.name, capital1.position + capital2.position - 1) end 'name' ) as groupname cross apply ( select len(sm.definition) - len(replace(sm.definition, CHAR(13), '')) 'count' ) as newlines where p.is_ms_shipped = 0 and p.name not like 'dt_%' group by grouping sets ((s.name), (s.name, groupname.name), ()) order by grouping(s.name) desc, s.name, grouping(groupname.name) desc, groupname.name
